amendment.description: To clarify that the amendment shall not be construed as a declaration of war or an authorization of the use of military force.

vote.text: Amendment SA 96 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 96 proposed by Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 65. (consideration: CR S789; text: CR S789) To clarify that the amendment shall not be construed as a declaration of war or an authorization of the use of military force.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 96 proposed by Senator Menendez to Amendment SA 65.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 96 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
